manifest.install: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_tech_superarticle_article` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `eid` int(11) NOT NULL COMMENT '公众号id', `title` varchar(255) NOT NULL COMMENT '文章标题', `author` varchar(255) NOT NULL COMMENT '作者', `content` longtext NOT NULL COMMENT '文章内容', `is_delete` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '1为删除', `createtime` int(11) NOT NULL, `zannum` int(11) NOT NULL COMMENT '点赞人数', `yuenum` int(11) NOT NULL COMMENT '阅读量', `thumb` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `fx_title` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `fx_desc` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `fx_img` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `fx_url` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `category_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL, `is_save` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `keyword` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `aid` int(255) DEFAULT NULL, `desc` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `a_order` int(11) DEFAULT '0', `y_url` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=23 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_tech_superarticle_category` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL, `name` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `enabled` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', `we7_cat` int(11) NOT NULL, `qd_enabled` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `c_order` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=5 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_tech_superarticle_comment` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `eid` int(11) NOT NULL, `openid` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `ar_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `comment` text NOT NULL, `createtime` int(10) NOT NULL, `is_jing` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '1为精品评论，2为作者回复', `is_author` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '1作者回复', `p_id` int(11) NOT NULL COMMENT '作者回复的评论id', `pingzan_num` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_tech_superarticle_dashang` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `eid` int(11) NOT NULL, `openid` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `ar_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `createtime` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `endtime` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `fee` decimal(10,2) NOT NULL, `status` tinyint(1) NOT NULL, `status1` tinyint(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=2 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_tech_superarticle_indexs` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL, `title` varchar(1000) NOT NULL, `ad1_title` varchar(1000) DEFAULT NULL, `ad1_thumb` varchar(1000) DEFAULT NULL, `ad1_url` varchar(1000) DEFAULT NULL, `ad2_title` varchar(1000) DEFAULT NULL, `ad2_thumb` varchar(1000) DEFAULT NULL, `ad2_url` varchar(1000) DEFAULT NULL, `ad3_title` varchar(1000) DEFAULT NULL, `ad3_thumb` varchar(1000) DEFAULT NULL, `ad3_url` varchar(1000) DEFAULT NULL, `fx_title` varchar(1000) DEFAULT NULL, `fx_thumb` varchar(1000) DEFAULT NULL, `fx_desc` varchar(1000) DEFAULT NULL, `categorys` varchar(1000) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_tech_superarticle_member` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `eid` int(11) NOT NULL, `nickname` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `openid` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `heading` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `createtime` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `ip` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `province` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `city` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `is_dashang` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '1为参与打赏', `is_pinglun` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '1为参与评论', `ar_id` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=16 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_tech_superarticle_member_article` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `eid` int(11) NOT NULL, `openid` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `ar_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `fenxiang_num` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=17 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_tech_superarticle_mystyle` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `uniacid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL, `title` varchar(36) NOT NULL, `code` text NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=5 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_tech_superarticle_setting` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `eid` int(11) NOT NULL, `ar_id` int(11) NOT NULL COMMENT '文章id', `original` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '1为原创', `yuanwen` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1' COMMENT '0为设置原文链接', `yuanwen_link` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `dashang` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '1为开启打赏', `gratuity_money` varchar(255) NOT NULL COMMENT '默认打赏金额，字符串1，1，1，1，1', `is_own` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '1为开启自定义打赏金额', `comment` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '1为开启评论，且自动，2为开启 评论，且手动', `is_comment` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1' COMMENT '0为关注公众号后评论', `is_yueduliang` tinyint(1) NOT NULL COMMENT '0无自定义阅读量，1自定义', `yueduliang` int(11) NOT NULL, `is_dianzan` tinyint(1) NOT NULL COMMENT '0无自定义点赞量，1自定义', `dianzanliang` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=23 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_tech_superarticle_wxstyle` ( `id` int(255) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `type` int(11) NOT NULL, `style` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `code` text NOT NULL, `stat` varchar(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `addtime` datetime NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=96904 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_tech_superarticle_zanstatus` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `ar_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `openid` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `wen_status` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '1用户已经点赞', `ping_status` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '用户已经评论', `eid` int(11) NOT NULL, `c_id` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
